body.p: Bug fixes - Users now can navigate between Target, Command and Value using tabs again. - Users can now restore their backup data from TestOps again. - Breakpoints are remembered when users switch between test case again. Improvements - Auto-suggested options now will disappear when users interact with other elements. - Test cases' execution status will be retained when users stop the execution mid-way. - Added an explanation via tooltip when users use Save Test Case functionality the first time.
